title: Can you survive the creation of the universe by solving this riddle? - James Tanton

multiple-choice.question: In the game played by particles in the ring, what happens when a particle of matter is adjacent to a particle of antimatter?

options.label: B
options.text: Stand to the immediate left of the final matter particles or the immediate right of the final antimatter particles.

options.label: C

options.label: D

options.label: B

options.text: 1 cube of matter and 27,182 cubes of antimatter.

options.label: D

options.text: To detect the full sequence of cubes around the circle.

options.label: B
options.text: To count cubes of each type.

options.label: C
options.text: To perform arithmetic and carry out simple logical commands.

multiple-choice.question: What is the mathematical model that can be used to identify safe spots in the ring?

options.label: A
options.text: A sum starting with +1, representing you, and scanning around the circle, adding +1 for each matter cube and subtracting -1 for each antimatter cube.

options.label: B
options.text: A product starting with +1, representing you, and scanning around the circle, multiplying +1 for each matter cube and multiplying -1 for each antimatter cube.

options.label: C
options.text: A ratio starting with +1, representing you, and scanning around the circle, dividing +1 for each matter cube and dividing -1 for each antimatter cube.

options.label: A

options.label: B
options.text: If the sum never hits 0, the spot is safe.

options.label: C
options.text: If the sum is positive, the spot is safe.

options.label: D
options.text: If the sum is negative, the spot is safe.

multiple-choice.question: What is the result of the introduction of pairs of cubes in the ring?

options.label: A
options.text: The sum of the cubes increases.

options.label: B
options.text: The sum of the cubes decreases.

options.label: C
options.text: The sum of the cubes remains the same.

options.label: D
options.text: The sum of the cubes is delayed.

multiple-choice.question: What is the purpose of running time backwards in the ring?

options.label: B
options.text: To identify the starting position of each matter cube.

options.label: C
options.text: To identify the exact annihilation partner of each matter cube.

options.label: D
options.text: To identify the number of matter cubes.

options.label: A
options.text: The sum of the cubes increases.

options.label: B
options.text: The sum of the cubes decreases.

options.label: C
options.text: The sum of the cubes remains the same.

options.label: D
options.text: The sum of the cubes is delayed.
